sentences.english: In bed , i rest my head on a soft pillow filled with feathers .
sentences.chinese: 躺在牀上，我將頭枕在柔軟的羽絨枕上。

sentences.english: Wash with cold water. This will prevent shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水清洗，以免羽絨服縮水。

sentences.english: If the watch is used to time, the Yurong Fu is used to keep warm.
sentences.chinese: 如手錶是用來計時的，羽絨服是用來保暖的。

sentences.english: It was very cold outside, so she went out in a thick down jacket.
sentences.chinese: 外面非常冷，所以她穿了一件厚厚的羽絨服出去了。

sentences.english: In winter, cotton coat or feather cloth will be necessary.
sentences.chinese: 冬季則需穿棉大衣或羽絨服。

sentences.english: Down power to inflate and fill up with air.
sentences.chinese: 蓬鬆度是指羽絨蓄含空氣和膨脹的能力。

sentences.english: Down cleanliness testing device based on photoresistance diagram shown in Figure 4.
sentences.chinese: 基於光敏電阻的羽絨清潔度檢驗裝置的示意圖見圖4。

sentences.english: Manufacturers of fine quality down duvets and bed linens.
sentences.chinese: 高質量羽絨被和牀上日用品的生產商。

sentences.english: Eider down clothes of novel design have Been in short supply this winter.
sentences.chinese: 設計新穎的羽絨系列服裝，成爲今冬的緊俏貨。

sentences.english: This ensures that the coat's feathers dry without sticking.
sentences.chinese: 這可以確保羽絨在乾的過程中不粘成塊。

sentences.english: A feather bed enervates the body of a child.
sentences.chinese: 小孩睡羽絨牀身體會變弱。

sentences.english: This is my new down jacket.
What clothes should you take with you? I should take a down coat, and boots.
sentences.chinese: 你應該帶什麼衣服走？我應該帶羽絨服和靴子。

sentences.english: Do you have this down jacket in different colors?
sentences.chinese: 這件羽絨服有不同的顏色嗎？
來顯示自己震顫的羽絨？

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
